attributes.action: Change Hotel Quarantine Policy for Health Professionals returning UK
attributes.additional_details:
It’s unreasonable to make Health professionals quarantine in a hotel after returning from red list countries it would just add mental and financial stress. 
If NHS can trust a health professional with patients’ lives , Government should be able to trust their integrity. 

Finally,Hotel quarantine is adding financial stress on NHS as well. Employers will have to pay for hotel quarantine for International Medical Graduates , coming from countries on the red list to start work in NHS.
attributes.background: Health professionals have worked hard for NHS during this pandemic. Residents of UK who are health professionals would only visit their homeland weighing the risk and benefit of foreign travel a lot more responsibly than any other person.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586382
